DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine post-manipulation elastic therapeutic tape ( ETT ) TheraBand® Kinesiology Tape neck pain patient impact neck range motion ( ROM ) post-manipulation pain . A convenience sample 50 patient , age 18-64 , present acute non-complicated postural neck pain recruit outpatient chiropractic clinic . Upon provide consent participate , patient randomly assign 2 group ; Control Group ( manipulation ) Tape Group ( manipulation plus tape ) . Pain neck ROM record 3 different interval : ( 1 ) pre-cervical manipulation , ( 2 ) within 5 minute cervical manipulation , ( 3 ) 24-48 hour manipulation .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect TheraBand® Kinesiology Tape Post-manipulation Pain Range Motion
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine post-manipulation elastic therapeutic tape ( ETT ) TheraBand® Kinesiology Tape neck pain patient impact neck range motion ( ROM ) post-manipulation pain . A convenience sample 50 patient , age 18-64 , present acute non-complicated postural neck pain recruit outpatient chiropractic clinic . Complications would include discogenic pain radicular symptom . Inclusionary criterion would also consist onset less 18 day indication cervical manipulation , include pain , decrease range motion , hypertonicity . Exclusionary criterion include pregnancy , contraindication manipulation , previous neck surgery . Patients recruit first visit ensure n't receive manipulation current plan care . Upon provide consent participate , patient randomly assign 2 group ; Control Group ( n=25 ) Tape Group ( n=25 ) . Pain neck ROM record 3 different interval : ( 1 ) pre-cervical manipulation , ( 2 ) within 5 minute cervical manipulation , ( 3 ) 24-48 hour manipulation . The control group receive manipulation , Tape Group ETT TheraBand® Kinesiology Tape apply immediately follow cervical manipulation . The tap protocol apply investigator consist `` Y '' strip apply 25 % tension run superior inferior hair line T1-2 horizontal `` I '' strip apply 50 % tension site pain . Six cervical range motion value record utilizing Acumar DataCapture hand-held dual inclinometer . Range motion measure maximum ( max ) degrees average degree 6 trial include : flexion ( F ) , extension € , leave side-bending ( LSB ) , right side-bending ( RSB ) , leave rotation ( LR ) , right rotation ( RR ) . Measure pain ask patient use Numeric Pain Rating Scale ( NPRS ) 0-10 . They ask rate pain rest motion .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion include age 1864 present noncomplicated postural neck pain , indication cervical manipulation , include pain , decrease range motion , hypertonicity . Exclusion criterion include discogenic pain radicular symptom , pregnancy , contraindication manipulation , previous neck surgery
